segments.text: Have you been registered yet , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you a medical or surgical case ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have your medical history sheet with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please fill in this admission card . Well , how long do you expect to stay in the hospital ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The doctor told me to stay about one month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But there're no beds available now . Two patients will be discharged this afternoon , so you'll have to wait until then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , when they leave the hospital , give me a call and I'll come back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . See you in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1
